hero.title: Design that connects with your audience
hero.subtitle: I help small businesses and startups create beautiful, strategic brand identities and websites that attract customers and build trust. From concept to launch, let's bring your vision to life.
hero.imageAlt: Designer workspace with sketches and color swatches

about.title: Creative Design Solutions
about.subtitle: Bringing brands to life since 2019
about.content: I'm Luna, a freelance designer specializing in brand identity and web design for purpose-driven businesses. My approach combines strategic thinking with beautiful aesthetics to create designs that not only look amazing but drive real results.

products.name: Brand Identity Package
products.description: Complete brand identity including logo, color palette, typography, brand guidelines, and marketing materials.

products.name: Website Design
products.description: Custom 5-page website design in Figma with responsive layouts. Includes 2 rounds of revisions.

products.name: Logo Design
products.description: Unique logo design with 3 concepts, unlimited revisions, and final files in all formats.

products.name: Social Media Templates
products.description: 15 customizable Canva templates for Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn. On-brand and ready to use.

products.name: Brand Refresh
products.description: Update your existing brand with modern design, refined colors, and updated marketing materials.

products.name: VIP Design Day
products.description: Intensive 8-hour session to tackle your urgent design project. Perfect for quick turnaround needs.

items.text: Luna transformed our brand! The new identity perfectly captures who we are. Our customers love it and we've seen a 40% increase in inquiries since launching.
items.author: Sarah Chen
items.title: Founder, Wellness Studio

items.text: Working with Luna was a dream. She listened, asked great questions, and delivered exactly what we needed. The website is stunning and super easy to navigate!
items.author: Mike Rodriguez
items.title: Owner, Local Coffee Shop

items.text: Best investment we made! Luna's brand package gave us a professional look that elevated our entire business. Highly recommend!
items.author: Emma Taylor
items.title: Co-Founder, Tech Startup

members.name: Luna Martinez
members.title: Brand & Web Designer
members.bio: BFA in Graphic Design from RISD. 6+ years helping businesses create impactful brands. Featured in Design Milk and The Dieline. Passionate about empowering entrepreneurs through great design.

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.description: We'll discuss your vision, goals, and project requirements

steps.title: Research & Concepts
steps.description: I'll research your industry and create initial design concepts

steps.title: Revisions
steps.description: Refine the design based on your feedback until it's perfect

steps.title: Final Delivery
steps.description: Receive all final files and launch your new brand!
